name: FlipBox
description:
FlibBox is a short puzzle experience in which you rotate maze-like boxes in an attempt to bring all the coloured blocks in each level together. With its very simple set of mechanics, it's easy to learn and get into.

Built by a South African game design student over the course of a week, FlipBox is still but a prototype and proof of concept. That said, I believe it holds some potential for complex level design, interesting challenge and a lot of expansion.

Created by Erik Prinz
